ygData.subject: Re: generators
ygData.msgSnippet: Indeed... as far as I can tell, the tents shut down the quickest, and the mage towers stay active the longest. I could very well be wrong, though.

Indeed... as far as I can tell, the tents shut down
the quickest, and the mage towers stay active the
longest. I could very well be wrong, though.
